scripts.enter: docker exec -it sql-postgres-1 psql -U myuser -d mydb
scripts.seed: docker exec -i sql-postgres-1 psql -U myuser -d dive < ./seed.sql
scripts.create-db: docker exec -i sql-postgres-1 psql -U myuser -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE dive;"
scripts.drop-db: docker exec -i sql-postgres-1 psql -U myuser -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS dive;"
scripts.simulate: docker exec -i sql-postgres-1 psql -U myuser -d dive < ./script.sql
